description:
IT Link Solutions is an IT consulting and software development company in California. Since 1997 we have developed, delivered and successfully implemented software solutions for various businesses including: healthcare and medical, insurance, real estate, academic, retail and distribution, telecommunication and other business sectors.
Influencing on our overall reach, proficiency across different industries and experienced Project Management Methodologies, we deliver flexible, customized and skilled software development services. IT Link Solutions is a software & web development company that provides value to clients that most web development companies cannot provide. This is mainly due to our unique web site development strategy & business model, proven project management processes, excellent technical resources and speed in customer response. Some of the most important reasons why clients find. IT Link Solutionsto be a perfect technology partner are: Reducing IT and business cost. Reducing time and money spent of IT. Reducing risk to cash flow. Solving business problems. Increasing your business productivity and revenue. Making your IT more environmentally friendly.
